theorem perron_frobenius_nonneg: fixes A :: "real Matrix.mat" assumes A: "A \<in> carrier_mat n n" and pos: "nonneg_mat A" and n: "n \<noteq> 0" shows "\<exists> sr ks f. sr \<ge> 0 \<and> 0 \<notin> set ks \<and> ks \<noteq> [] \<and> char_poly A = prod_list (map (\<lambda> k. monom 1 k - [:sr ^ k:]) ks) * f \<and> (\<forall> x. poly (map_poly complex_of_real f) x = 0 \<longrightarrow> cmod x < sr)"
